<tr class="spectrum-Table-row" id="slots_" data-name="Slot name" data-value="default slot">

<td class="spectrum-Table-cell">
<code>default slot</code>
</td>

<td class="spectrum-Table-cell">
text label of the Tab
</td>

</tr>

<tr class="spectrum-Table-row" id="slots_icon" data-name="Slot name" data-value="icon">

<td class="spectrum-Table-cell">
<code>icon</code>
</td>

<td class="spectrum-Table-cell">
The icon that appears on the left of the label
</td>

</tr>

</tbody>
</table>

<tr class="spectrum-Table-row" id="events_sp-tab-contentchange" data-name="Event name" data-value="sp-tab-contentchange">

<td class="spectrum-Table-cell">
<code>sp-tab-contentchange</code>
</td>

<td class="spectrum-Table-cell">
<code>Event</code>
</td>

<td class="spectrum-Table-cell">
<code>When the content in a tab has changed, JS powered layout related to that content may also need to be changed.</code>
</td>

</tr>
